text.en: Profound and peaceful, free from complexity, uncompounded luminosity—
text.en-trans: zab zhi trödral ösal dü ma ché

text.en: Having realized the nectar-like nature of reality,
text.en-trans: dütsi tabü chönyi dön tok né

text.en: May I gain the power to guide infinite beings
text.en-trans: gang la gang dül tabkhé chöpa yi

text.en: Through the skilful conduct of training each according to their needs.
text.en-trans: pakyé drowa drenpé tu tob shok
